      • rotateVec

        public static com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3i rotateVec(Rotation rotation,
                                                             com.flowpowered.math.vector.Vector3i vector3i)
        Rotates a Vector3i towards a supplied Rotation. The resulting MovecraftRotation is based on a center of (0,0,0).
        Parameters:
        rotation - the direction to add
        vector3i - the location to add
        Returns:
        a rotated Movecraft location
